name: The Dark Debt
storyline: Nathan Brooks is a 25-year-old software developer. He constantly postpones his debt to the man he owes via the Dark Web. But the person he owes money to must be tired of this situation now that Nathan wakes up from a night's sleep and sees a message on his computer: "If you don't pay the debt tonight, you'll die!". On top of this debt, Nathan gets to work, and you play as Nathan Brooks in this story.
summary: The Dark Debt is a deep web horror-survival game developed by Voidlight Games.
